Product Description: ['View larger', 'Collections', 'Ready to take the dare to get your healthiest hair ever? Since 1945, Pantene’s passion has been healthy, lustrous hair – giving you everything you need to let your hair shine. Pantene has the answer to all your hair questions, offering a range of solutions to meet your hair needs and achieve healthy, flawless, oh-so-shiny strands.', 'Find the Pantene that works for you, and experience for yourself why Pantene is the world’s number one hair care brand.', 'Gold Standard of Hair', 'Pantene: Dare to give your hair the Gold Standard. Volume Collection: Turn flat hair into thick, full 24-hour volume* with a plumping effect inspired by collagen.', '*3-step system of volume shampoo, conditioner, and root lifting spray gel', 'View larger', 'Smooth Collection: Shampoo, Conditioner & Shine Serum', 'Dare to go 72 hour smooth.* Smooth System: Stay smooth all summer. Moroccan Argan Oil in a Pro-V system helps lock out humidity and keeps frizz from forming.', '*Smooth shampoo and conditioner system', 'View larger', 'Daily Moisture Renewal Collection: Shampoo, Conditioner & Silky Moisture Whip', 'Dare to erase the damage of 100 blow-drys.* Daily Moisture Renewal: The Pro-V System Nourishes to help lock in moisture and fight blow-dry damage.', '*Damage to smoothness and shine', 'View larger', 'Color Preserve Shine Collection: Shampoo & Conditioner', 'Dare to fight fade wash after wash. Pantene Color Preserve Shine gives color treated hair a new protective outer layer and leaves hair vibrant.', 'View larger', 'Pro-V Stylers: Your Hair Style Essentials', 'Dare to do the Style, Not the Damage. Pantene Pro-V Stylers: Try Pantene’s complete line of styling products. A full range of Pro-V formulas to smooth, add volume, protect, or hold your hair healthy style all day.']

Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '9.5 x 4.9 x 3.8 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '080878175338 796433577324', 'Manufacturer': 'Pantene'}
Review Text: This is my usual conditioner but I've been looking for a bigger bottle that doesn't have the pump top. This fits the bill great.
Review Title: Now this will last me a while

reference_summary:
Pantene Pro-v Ultimate 10 Bb Conditioner With Pump, 28.9 Fluid Ounce
Pantene
["Multitask like you mean it with Pantene Pro-V Ultimate 10 BB Conditioner. BB stands for beauty boosting and this conditioner's formula works overtime to help tame fly-aways, repair roughness, infuse silky softness, add brilliant shine, smooth, control frizz, boost moisture, detangle, make hair manageable, and help keep your strands strong against damage. Help solve your hair problems from dryness to dullness with this 10in1 conditioner for flawlessly healthy hair. Also try it with the shampoo and treatment in the Pantene Pro-V Ultimate 10 Collection."]

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Care Focus**: Continues to emphasize moisturizing and conditioning products tailored for dry hair, actively seeking solutions that tackle multiple concerns.
- **Preference for Multipurpose Products**: Values items that deliver various benefits, including detangling, frizz control, and enhancing shine, reaffirming their commitment to multifunctional solutions.
- **Quality Assurance**: Maintains a strong appreciation for high-quality hair care products, demonstrated by perfect ratings for favored items. The user recently praised a usual conditioner for its effectiveness and size, reflecting their interest in practical packaging.
- **Sensory Enjoyment**: Places significant importance on the fragrance of products, indicating a preference for scents that enhance the hair care experience.
- **Strong Brand Loyalty**: Shows a clear allegiance to reputable brands recognized for their effective hair care solutions. Their recent purchase indicates a preference for established names known for quality.

Overall, this user consistently favors effective, multifunctional hair care products that enhance the health and appearance of dry hair while prioritizing a pleasant sensory experience, further indicated by their recent purchase of a larger, adequately packaged conditioner.
